summary: Utility class that provides tensor manipulation helpers for a funnel‑shaped relative multi‑head attention layer, covering positional embedding retrieval, pre‑ and post‑attention pooling, relative position calculation, stride‑based pooling, and conversion of token type IDs into matrix form.
business_intent: Support the implementation of efficient funnel transformer attention mechanisms in TensorFlow by encapsulating common preprocessing and postprocessing operations needed for relative multi‑head attention.
